org.cloudifysource.dsl
Class ServiceProcessingUnit

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.dsl.ServiceProcessingUnit
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataGrid, Memcached, StatefulProcessingUnit, StatelessProcessingUnit
public abstract class ServiceProcessingUnit
extends Object

The abstract class ServiceProccessingUnit holds all the data shared by the different processing units i.e. DataGrid, StatelessPU, StatefulPU and Memcached. Specifically holds the Processing unit's SLA and it's context properties.

Author:
adaml

Method Detail

getSla

public Sla getSla()
Returns the SLA object as defined in the groovy service file. The SLA holds in it the JVM's memory and availability definitions.

Returns:
a processing unit's SLA object.

getContextProperties

public Map<String,String> getContextProperties()
returns a Map that holds all of the processing unit's context properties.

Returns:
a Map object holding all of the PU context properties.
